meanings.definition: A palm tree with fan-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The palmetto swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love the shade provided by the palmetto in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used a palmetto leaf as a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The palmetto stood tall like a green umbrella in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the palmetto leaves brightened up the landscape.

meanings.definition: A leaf of a palmetto tree.
meanings.sent1: I collected a bunch of palmetto leaves for my art project.
meanings.sent2: The palmetto leaf rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with a palmetto leaf, thinking it was a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The ground was carpeted with fallen palmetto leaves.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the palmetto leaf was rough and fibrous.

meanings.definition: A hat made of palmetto leaves.
meanings.sent1: The islander wore a traditional palmetto hat.
meanings.sent2: She weaved a beautiful palmetto hat for the festival.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about wearing a palmetto hat to a fancy dinner.
meanings.sent4: The palmetto hat shielded her face from the sun.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the palmetto hat impressed everyone.
